translations: 违抗，不服从；挑战，激；无法，难以（描述或理解）；经受住，顶住

sentences.sentence: I wouldn't have dared to defy my teachers.
sentences.translation: 我可不敢不听老师的话。

sentences.sentence: I defy anyone not to cry at the end of the film.
sentences.translation: 我倒要看看有谁在电影结尾时不哭。

sentences.sentence: This was the first (and last) time that I dared to defy my mother.
sentences.translation: 这是我第一次（也是最后一次）胆敢违抗我母亲。
